{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T21:07:13.000Z", "description": "

Data Scientist/Analyst

Location: SFO, CA (Remote can work from anywhere but wiling to work Pacific hours).

3 Rounds of Interview

 

Mandatory:

\u00b7        3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience

\u00b7        Strong understanding of SQL

\u00b7        Experience with conducting data analysis in Python and / or R

\u00b7        Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations

\u00b7        Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels

\u00b7        Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights

 

Pluses

\u00b7        Familiarity with Superset

\u00b7        Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests

\u00b7        Familiarity with machine learning basics

\u00b7        Familiarity with Client infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL

\u00b7        Experience creating and maintaining data pipelines

\u00b7        Experience supporting engineering product work
